name: fhymatrix-be
description: Microservices architecture with NestJS, Prisma, gRPC, and PostgreSQL

scripts.start:all: concurrently -k -n AUTH,USER,OTHER,GATEWAY "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:user" "npm run start:other" "npm run start:gateway"
scripts.prisma:gen:all: npm run prisma:gen:auth && npm run prisma:gen:user && npm run prisma:gen:other
scripts.prisma:migrate:auth: cd services/auth-service && npx prisma migrate dev --name init --schema=src/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate:user: echo 'User service menggunakan database yang sama dengan auth, migrasi dijalankan di auth-service'
scripts.prisma:migrate:other: cd services/other-service && npx prisma migrate dev --name init --schema=src/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate:all: npm run prisma:migrate:auth && npm run prisma:migrate:other && npm run prisma:migrate:user
